my_business: Zhians Private Limited is a women-first reproductive healthtech startup based in Chennai. We focus on fertility, pregnancy, postpartum, and overall reproductive wellness, combining AI-powered digital health modules with cultural sensitivity. Our Fertility Care Module and Predictive Pregnancy Program (PPP) provide personalized insights, partner sync, and holistic support for women and families. We are also expanding into digital wellness solutions such as smoking cessation programs, aiming to make preventive and lifestyle health support more accessible.
top_product: Our Fertility Care Module – an AI-powered, women-first solution that helps couples and families plan their pregnancy with personalized insights, emotional readiness tools, partner sync, and holistic reproductive wellness support.
ideal_referral: My ideal referral would be couples, women, or families who are planning for pregnancy, navigating fertility challenges, or seeking holistic reproductive wellness solutions. I also work closely with doctors, gynecologists, skin specialists, psychiatrists, and wellness coaches for in-app consultations; collaborate with D2C health and wellness brands who want to reach women through our platform; and partner with fertility centers and maternity hospitals to expand access to trusted reproductive health support.
top_problem_solved: We help women and couples reduce stress, confusion, and misinformation around fertility and reproductive health by offering a clear, AI-powered, and holistic support system that makes the journey from planning to postpartum simpler and more supported.
my_favourite_bni_story: My favourite BNI story is actually how I joined. A random LinkedIn ping to someone turned into an introduction to a room full of business people and that moment showed me the unexpected power of connections and how opportunities can open up from the simplest conversations.

ideal_referral: Ideal Referral: Professionals, leaders, young adults, or athletes who feel mentally overwhelmed, emotionally stuck, or unsure about their next steps—especially those who are open to a holistic approach to self-growth and performance. Connect me to: Doctors, therapists, HR managers, wellness coaches, and sports academies or football/cricket coaches who care about their players’ mindset and well-being. How to Refer Me: “Rajalakshmi Ramesh( Raji), Founder of Seagull Compass, with over 25 years of experience in the training and coaching industry. She is a certified life coach and has delivered more than 4,000 hours of training and coaching. Her work spans soft skills development, wellness coaching, emotional intelligence, and holistic well-being — all designed to help individuals thrive both personally and professionally.
top_problem_solved: Helped a trainee pilot overcome intense performance anxiety using a holistic coaching approach—blending emotional intelligence, mindfulness, and journaling—leading to renewed confidence, focus, and success in flight training.
my_favourite_bni_story: As a new member, completing my mentoring journey has been a highlight. My mentor’s appreciation for my meticulousness and dedication gave me a real boost. Let’s connect for a one-to-one—I’d love to know how I can support you or someone you care about!
